summary.subject: Post-Doc Position at Linz Institute of Technology (Johannes Kepler Univ. Linz, Austria) (full time, 3 years)
summary.institution: Johannes Kepler University (JKU) Linz Institute of Technology (LIT)
focus_areas: Distributed Software Systems and Software Architectures, esp. Distributed Stream Processing Systems
Cloud Computing and Software Performance, esp. in Large, Distributed Data Systems
Real-Time, Scalable Data Processing and Querying
job_duties: Conduct Software Engineering research in the fields mentioned above
Lay the foundation for the next generation of highly scalable, data-driven software applications in collaboration with Dynatrace
Publish, present and disseminate research findings in journals, conferences and workshops
Collaborate with fellow JKU researchers and academic and industrial partners
qualifications: Strong software engineering background with experience in one or multiple focus areas
Doctorate/Ph.D. degree in Computer Science or related field
Experience and/or expertise in one of the research areas
Experience in academic/scientific publications and presenting scientific work
Experience with Apache Spark, Apache Flink, Apache Kafka and Kubernetes (desired)
